thread.title: Genie Bouchard made good on that date she promised (8 Photos)
thread.title_full: Genie Bouchard made good on that date she promised (8 Photos)

author: Chase
title: Genie Bouchard made good on that date she promised (8 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Right after the Super Bowl we posted about a bet that Canadian tennis star, Genie Bouchard, made with a Twitter follower. 2 
When the Falcons were up big she bet that the Patriots wouldn’t win, but Tom Brady’s heroics have now put her under the gun. 3 
It looked like she was going to honor that bet from the get-go, as she reached out to the Twitter follower right after the game. 4 
Yesterday she was busy with the Sports Illustrated swimsuit launch, because when you’re a 22-year-old smoking hot tennis star that’s what you fill your off days with, but dropped a hint that she might be making good on her promise. 5 
And it looks like she did, because her and University of Missouri student named John went to the Brooklyn Nets game last night.
